data.name: Shady Knight Demo
data.detailed_description:
FEATURES

  • Mastering is the key. There are no locked skills or hidden chests with slightly better items. You are deadly as hell by default, the hard part is mastering your abilities: learning to read the distance, feel the timing, exploit the physics, and keep the flow. You can pin enemies to the walls with the thrown sword or fire up your arrow for an explosive shot from the very beginning
  • The best kick in video games since 2006. Overpowered as you've always wanted
  • Improvise! You can kick your opponents into each other, into breakable objects, and down to the ocean, they take more damage in a free-fall and can die accidentally from a blunt impact or bad landing. Make sure that your enemies are actually dead otherwise, they will fight back
  • Replayable levels. Each of the main levels is a monumental handcrafted action-packed maze-like tower filled with tight fights and fluid platforming to deliver diverse and fun playthrough
  • Minimalistic style with the vibrant colors keep everything readable and bring intense and interactive swordfights even to your budget laptop

There is no need to become more powerful than you already are. You have been the master of a sword and a bow. You have been the mightiest. Now don’t waste your time on something else besides what you can do best and be grateful – the afterlife is expensive

DEVELOPMENT

  • The game is currently in development so there are some placeholder models and textures
  • You can check out my twitter for more gameplay/dev sneak peeks from Shady Knight and future announces: https://twitter.com/cptnsigh

data.short_description: Shady Knight is a first-person medieval action game focused on dynamic interactive fights and fluid platforming. You'll run through high maze-like castles using overpowered kick, explosive arrows, sword throwing, and all kinds of brutal fun. Master your abilities to become the dancing blade of death
